item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "Dependence begets subservience and venality, suffocates the germ of virtue, and prepares fit tools for the designs of ambition." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by T.H. White
item.description: "Perhaps we all give the best of our hearts uncritically--to those who hardly think about us in return." -- T.H. White

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie ten Boom
item.description: "Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God." -- Corrie ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "This is what the past is for! Every experience God gives us, every person He puts in our lives is the perfect preparation for the future that only He can see." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Worrying is carrying tomorrow's load with today's strength- carrying two days at once. It is moving into tomorrow ahead of time. Worrying doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "What wings are to a bird, and sails to a ship, so is prayer to the soul. " -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Any concern too small to be turned into a prayer is too small to be made into a burden." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "You can never learn that Christ is all you need, until Christ is all you have." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Dear Jesus...how foolish of me to have called for human help when You are here." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Faith is like radar that sees through the fog -- the reality of things at a distance that the human eye cannot see." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Corrie ten Boom
item.description: "When I try, I fail. When I trust, He succeeds." -- Corrie ten Boom

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life." -- John Lennon

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by John Piper
item.description: "The strength of patience hangs on our capacity to believe that God is up to something good for us in all our delays and detours." -- John Piper

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by C. S. Lewis
item.description: "I didn’t go to religion to make me happy. I always knew a bottle of Port would do that. If you want a religion to make you feel really comfortable, I certainly don’t recommend Christianity." -- C. S. Lewis

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Don't handicap your children by making their lives easy." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "So come with me, where dreams are born, and time is never planned. Just think of happy things, and your heart will fly on wings, forever, in Never Never Land!" -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Lorelei add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description:
"Build a house?" exclaimed John.
"For the Wendy," said Curly.
"For Wendy?" John said, aghast. "Why, she is only a girl!"
"That," explained Curly, "is why we are her servants." -- J.M. Barrie
